comments:
1. Create a folder in a branch with a file in it.
   Commit the folder and file to the repository.
2. Create the same folder in HEAD with a different file in it.
   Commit the folder and file to the repository.
3. Merge HEAD into the branch or vice-versa (both cases exhibit
   the same problem).
4. Notice that when the global 'show pseudo-conflicts' option is
   enabled, the editor shows a folder pseudo-conflict and an
   incoming file addition.  When the global 'show pseudo-conflicts'
   option is disabled, neither the folder nor the file is shown.

In the merge view hower over the incoming addition, an NPE will occur:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CVSSyncCompareInput$1.mouseMove(CVSSyncCompareInput.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:136)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.notifyListeners(Widget.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:819)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run(InternalBootLoader.java:777)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:319)


	at EclipseRuntimeLauncher.main(EclipseRuntimeLauncher.java:14)
